mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT S.MOVIE_ID ,M.MOVIE_ID ,M.AGE_LIMIT ,M.TITLE_KOR FROM HICGV_THEATER_SCHEDULE S LEFT JOIN HICGV_MOVIE M ON S.MOVIE_ID = M.MOVIE_ID ORDER BY M.TITLE_KOR
SELECT * FROM HICGV_THEATER ORDER BY THEATER_ID
SELECT T.THEATER_ID, T.THEATER_LOC, TL.LOCATION_ID, TL.LOCATION_NAME FROM HICGV_THEATER T INNER JOIN HICGV_THEATER_LOCATION TL ON T.THEATER_ID =TL.THEATER_ID ORDER BY T.THEATER_ID, TL.LOCATION_NAME

SELECT S.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID, S.MOVIE_ID, M.TITLE_KOR, M.AGE_LIMIT, T.THEATER_ID ,T.THEATER_LOC, L.LOCATION_ID, L.LOCATION_NAME, TO_CHAR (START_DATE, 'dd') AS DAY, S.START_DATE, R.ROOM_NAME, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'hh:MI') AS STARTTIME,M.RUNNING_TIME, R.MAX_SEAT FROM HICGV_THEATER_SCHEDULE S LEFT JOIN HICGV_THEATER_LOCATION L ON S.LOCATION_ID = L.LOCATION_ID LEFT JOIN HICGV_THEATER_ROOM R ON S.THEATER_ROOM_ID = R.THEATER_ROOM_ID LEFT JOIN HICGV_THEATER T ON L.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID LEFT JOIN HICGV_MOVIE M ON S.MOVIE_ID = M.MOVIE_ID WHERE S.MOVIE_ID = #{movieid} AND T.THEATER_ID=#{theaterid} AND L.LOCATION_ID= #{locid} AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'dd') = #{tday} ORDER BY S.START_DATE

SELECT S.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID, S.MOVIE_ID, M.TITLE_KOR, M.AGE_LIMIT, T.THEATER_ID ,T.THEATER_LOC, L.LOCATION_ID, L.LOCATION_NAME, TO_CHAR (START_DATE, 'dd') AS DAY, S.START_DATE, R.ROOM_NAME, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'hh:MI') AS STARTTIME, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'hh') AS STARTHOUR, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'MI') AS STARTMINUTE, M.RUNNING_TIME, R.MAX_SEAT FROM HICGV_THEATER_SCHEDULE S LEFT JOIN HICGV_THEATER_LOCATION L ON S.LOCATION_ID = L.LOCATION_ID LEFT JOIN HICGV_THEATER_ROOM R ON S.THEATER_ROOM_ID = R.THEATER_ROOM_ID LEFT JOIN HICGV_THEATER T ON L.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID LEFT JOIN HICGV_MOVIE M ON S.MOVIE_ID = M.MOVIE_ID WHERE S.MOVIE_ID = #{movieid } AND T.THEATER_ID=#{theaterid } AND L.LOCATION_ID= #{locid } AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'dd') = #{tday } AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'hh') = #{hour } AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'mi') = #{minute }
